    • Constructor Detail

      • RadiusServer

        public RadiusServer​(io.netty.channel.EventLoopGroup eventLoopGroup,
                    io.netty.channel.ChannelFactory<T> factory,
                    java.net.InetAddress listenAddress,
                    io.netty.channel.ChannelHandler authHandler,
                    io.netty.channel.ChannelHandler acctHandler,
                    int authPort,
                    int acctPort)
        Parameters:
        eventLoopGroup - for both channel IO and processing
        factory - to create new Channel
        listenAddress - local address to bind to, will be wildcard address if null
        authHandler - ChannelHandler to handle requests received on authPort
        acctHandler - ChannelHandler to handle requests received on acctPort
        authPort - port to bind to, or set to 0 to let system choose
        acctPort - port to bind to, or set to 0 to let system choose
